description:
Continuing the previous episode`s story, Nasuno and Yota end up playing water polo in the pool with Kanae and her friends. However, the weather suddenly worsens and the group seeks shelter inside the villa where an unfortunate incident occurs...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitsuji Hakase Ooi ni Tabe, Ooi ni Kataru
執事博士おおいに食べ, おおいに語る
